questions.question: What elements are part of the Strategy layer?
questions.answer: 1. Course of action; 2. Resource; 3. Capability; 4. Value Stream

questions.question: What are the structure elements of the Strategy layer?
What are the behavior elements of the Strategy layer?
questions.answer: 1. Course of action; 2. Value Stream; 3. Capability

questions.question: What are the strategy behavior elements of the Strategy layer?
What is a Resource in the Strategy layer?
questions.answer: An asset owned or controlled by an individual or an organization
